topic.title: Multi-ZeroMail/ZeroID?
topic.body:
How do I create different ZeroMail addresses if I can only create a single ZeroID?

Other than backing up my current ZeroID and restoring it to switch accounts...

1580517639_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc3.body:
> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_1821_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): yes just after god. i have an old 90ies phone, not interested to have an os 'on a phone', don't see the point: it's a phone.

All phones, even dumb phones, have an OS.

1580849186_1Ev2p6pn33TkPNNrMbNFwSspPzivp.body: Have info on ZeroNet about this?

1580861368_15yEW1sNBQdenjxaA84qPwp4taxXU.body:
> [lianna](#comment_115_16ePf6TBgip2eF88AxhnRJdPXyZJK1V2S4): use multiple zeronet installations

I guess it's light enough. If I can't come across any other solutions, I'll probably do something like that.

1580901933_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body:
> [ranshit](#comment_83_17XPGJDqy3F7zfV3sa4aMJF2Mhpati6N12): Some advice when uploading to KopyKate. [...]

I wish there was a better way to upload to multiple sites (as it looks like KopyKate has a few different Merged sites). It would be nice to have a "shared content" folder and then append them to different sites. Kind of like swarm merging when the same file (hash) is shared but under a different DHT file.

For example:
> My-Content-1080p-ShareSite.bit\My.Content.1080p.mp4
> My-Content-1080p-ShareSite.bit\ShareSite.bit.txt
Would share the same .mp4 with the other distributed files:
> My-Content-1080p-OtherShareSite.bit\My.Content.1080p.mp4

1580943879_1BFC6WPRFTMXJzb687o2bvFhgt3HL.body:
> [metokur](#comment_1_1BFC6WPRFTMXJzb687o2bvFhgt3HLci1v7): Forgive my newfaggotry, but what makes IFS better place to host video?

It's just distribution of different hosting places.
Personally, Kopy Kate is the best for content browsing.

IFS seems to have better auto-seeding (people automatically seeding the newest content).

1580397990_1BEt1F2JpPiMu7kxjyk92uYUz1z8J.body:
> [somuchfood](#comment_82_14dsVvztuXjBxWmk4s4HjUnxuN4AeNaVvk): netflix can rot in hell, I prefer torrenting movies and actually owning them

I don't mind paying for content.
I just prefer being able to access it when and where I want.

1581265040_17FotRRc6msHBzM2jrs6tQCmpLaXi.body: ZN comes with a set of bootstrap trackers. More trackers can be added in config. AFAIK, ZN doesn't limit the number of trackers you can add.

1581271452_17FotRRc6msHBzM2jrs6tQCmpLaXi.body: I don't think ZN creates .onion, but the /1ADDr3sS.... is what is used to share when a ZN site is created.
